sourcesContent:
<script>
import * as echarts from 'echarts';

export default {
  name: 'WorldMap',
  data() {
    return {
      selectedCountry: null,
      mineralResources: []
    };
  },
  mounted() {
    // 动态引入 world.js 文件和 minerals_production.json 数据集
    import('@/assets/world.js');  // 不需要从这个导入中获取任何值
    import('@/assets/minerals_production.json')  // 确保路径正确
      .then(mineralData => {
        this.initMap(mineralData.default);
      });
  },
  methods: {
    initMap(mineralData) {
      var chart = echarts.init(document.getElementById('map'));
      var option = {
        series: [
          {
            type: 'map',
            map: 'world',
            emphasis: {
              label: {
                show: true
              }
            }
          }
        ]
      };

      chart.setOption(option);

      chart.on('click', params => {
        if (params.componentType === 'series') {
          this.selectedCountry = params.name;
          this.mineralResources = mineralData[params.name] || [];
        }
      });
    }
  }
}
</script>
